entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lacombe AAFC 06:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few rain showers and flurries changing to flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
